mapper.sql: campaignId, portfolioid, name, budgetType, budget, startDate, endDate, servingStatus, state, spendingPolicy, bidOptimization, bidMultiplier, profileid, opttime
mapper.select: select min(opttime) from t_amz_adv_campaigns_hsa where profileid=#{profileid,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND adformat='video'

select r.campaignId campaignId1, sum(attributedDetailPageViewsClicks14d) attributedDetailPageViewsClicks14d, sum(attributedOrdersNewToBrand14d) attributedOrdersNewToBrand14d, sum(attributedOrdersNewToBrandPercentage14d) attributedOrdersNewToBrandPercentage14d, sum(attributedOrderRateNewToBrand14d) attributedOrderRateNewToBrand14d, sum(attributedSalesNewToBrand14d) attributedSalesNewToBrand14d, sum(attributedSalesNewToBrandPercentage14d) attributedSalesNewToBrandPercentage14d, sum(attributedUnitsOrderedNewToBrand14d) attributedUnitsOrderedNewToBrand14d, sum(attributedUnitsOrderedNewToBrandPercentage14d) attributedUnitsOrderedNewToBrandPercentage14d, sum(unitsSold14d) unitsSold14d, sum(dpv14d) dpv14d from t_amz_adv_rpt2_hsa_campaigns_brand r where r.bydate >= #{fromDate,jdbcType=DATE} and r.bydate <= #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE} and r.campaignId = #{campaignid,jdbcType=BIGINT} group by r.campaignId

select r.campaignId campaignId1, sum(viewableImpressions) viewableImpressions, sum(videoFirstQuartileViews) videoFirstQuartileViews, sum(videoMidpointViews) videoMidpointViews, sum(videoThirdQuartileViews) videoThirdQuartileViews, sum(videoCompleteViews) videoCompleteViews, sum(video5SecondViews) video5SecondViews, sum(video5SecondViewRate) video5SecondViewRate, sum(videoUnmutes) videoUnmutes, sum(vtr) vtr, sum(vctr) vctr from t_amz_adv_rpt2_hsa_campaigns_video r where r.bydate >= #{fromDate,jdbcType=DATE} and r.bydate <= #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE} and r.campaignId = #{campaignid,jdbcType=BIGINT} group by r.campaignId

select CAST(t.campaignId AS CHAR) campaignId, CAST(t.profileid AS CHAR) profileid,p.name name, sum(t.impressions) impressionsPlacement,sum(t.clicks) clicksPlacement,sum(t.cost) costPlacement, ifnull((sum(t.cost) / sum(t.clicks)),0) avgcostPlacement, case when ifnull(sum(cost),0)>0 and ifnull(sum(attributedSales14d),0)=0 then 10000000000 else ifnull((sum(cost) / sum(attributedSales14d)),0) end ACOSPlacement, ifnull((sum(attributedSales14d) / sum(t.cost)),0) ROASPlacement, ifnull(sum(attributedSales14d) - sum(attributedSales14dSameSKU),0) attributedSalesPlacement, sum(attributedSales14dSameSKU) attributedSalesSameSKUPlacement, ifnull(sum(attributedConversions14d),0) attributedConversionsPlacement, sum(attributedConversions14dSameSKU) attributedConversionsSameSKUPlacement, sum(attributedConversions14d) attributedUnitsOrderedPlacement, sum(attributedSales14d) sumSalesPlacement, sum(attributedConversions14d) sumUnitsPlacement, ifnull((sum(attributedConversions14d) / sum(clicks)),0) CSRTPlacement from t_amz_adv_rpt2_hsa_campaigns_place t left join t_amz_adv_rpt2_hsa_campaigns_place_attributed a on a.campaignId=t.campaignId and a.bydate=t.bydate left join t_amz_adv_rpt_placement p on p.id=t.placementid where t.bydate >= #{fromDate,jdbcType=DATE} and t.bydate <= #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE} and t.campaignId = #{campaignid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and t.profileid = #{profileid,jdbcType=BIGINT} group by t.placementid,t.campaignId,t.profileid
